com.kt.ca
Class CAAdaptor

java.lang.Object
  com.kt.ca.CAAdaptor
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public abstract class CAAdaptor
extends Object
implements Runnable

CAAdaptor provides interfaces with CAS. Those interfaces are all simple message based.

NOTE: Refers KT-CAS API document for the detail message format and tag value.

Since:
Kim Hyung Suk, 2010. 4. 10.
Version:
$Revision$
Author:
$Author$

request

public void request(long appId,
                    long transId,
                    int tag,
                    byte[] message)
             throws CAException
Processes the given messages with CAS and returns the result.

Parameters:
tag - CA message tag
message - byte array representing message body
Throws:
CAException - When any kind of exception happens.
